snippet.title: Launch Trailer Hexapoda
snippet.description:
After the last human war, gases were spread through the atmosphere making it unbreathable, pushing the richest to flee to orbital colonies and the others to take refuge underground.
You are a young hothead, hired by a team of scientists left on earth who are looking for a solution to bring humans back to the surface.

Get ready to fight giant Insects for the future of humanity !

Playlable from 1 to 4 players.
3 Modes : Normal, Hard and Manic. 
Unlock the 3 Different endings, new features and new items with "the new game+"
12 stages, 4 futuristic combat aircrafts with their own style of shooting, 
Fight  all the enemies and complete the bestiary full of giant creatures inspired by existing insects,
Unlock all the30 Achievements, and take the lead of the Leaderboards.

Enjoy the orignal epic soundtrack composed by the band Double Dragon!
